pods_fields.msg: Very good trip, changing weather nice nature, good crowd. However, bikes were somewhat too heavy for uphill climbs and some sections were along busy motorways. Good guides, professional and dedicated, felt safe and taken care of.. Dinners nice but somewhat too late .. It would be nice to structure some way to interact with locals say with local cycle enthusiasts and provide in advance bit more information on cities where we stay..

I strongly recommend this trip. I just returned from this trip and we were with a total group of 18 people. I personally had 9 with me  (7 of my teenage students) and every bit of the trip was fantastic. I was amazed at the planning this must have taken to map out the routes. We stopped in the quaintest towns for "coffee breaks"and lunches. How they planned the appropriate distances each day to stop in these towns for breaks and then get us to our end of day destination is amazing. Our guide, Ricardo, was fantastic. He has the perfect personality for this job. He made sure that this was a holiday for us. He was patient with the 7 students as they had little biking experience. They thoroughly enjoyed being around him and he made the trip enjoyable for them. 
The hotels were great, the meals were fantastic (albeit a bit long) and everything was so well organized. When I stopped to think about all the moving pieces of putting this trip together, I am boggled at how they made it look so easy. I can't wait to return for another trip myself to do some research for future trips for my students. I will absolutely be using Verde Natura for a very long time.

We just completed the bike and boat tour along the Amalfi Coast and couldn't  be happier with our experience! Each day was unique, beautiful and amazing in its own way. 

The crew (Francesco, Noemy, Kumar and Ciccio) transformed a beautiful boat into a safe, comfortable vacation home on the water.  They added amazing food, service and smiles and each, in  their unique way, made our experience and memories more personal and enjoyable! 

Alex was our guide and her picture should be in Wikipedia or in the Guide Training Manual under the title "The Perfect Guide"! She is warm, connected, engaging, encouraging, caring, flexible and extremely knowledgeable.   Her interaction with us was like a beautiful free-form dance and she ebbed and flowed as we needed her to. She had personal relationships in almost every town that we benefited from as these people treated us as if we were her family.  She set the stage for a wonderful adventure to unfold and made our experience absolutely amazing! We can't imagine ever going on another tour unless she is is leading it.  Thank you!

My husband and I can honestly say this was the best trip of our lives so far, and we've been on many different trips together!  I don't own a bike, but we are both in pretty good shape - I was still a little worried about the biking part.  Our guide, Alex, was amazing, and she knew we could all do it!  She took us to places and told us about all of it with such passion and sincerity.  She is so excited about what she does, and you can see it in her and in the tour.  The scenery, the places we visited, staying on the beautiful Silver Star with our impeccable crew (Francesco, Noemy, Ciccio and Pinku), was all so incredible.  We couldn't have asked for a better group of people!  We highly recommend this trip to everyone, and you must get Alex as your guide!

This goes down to be the best holiday in my life so far. I highly recommend this tour Bike and Boat Amalfi Coast the places I got to see and the things we got to do was amazing . Thank you for a great holiday.  :)

The Amalfi Bike & Boat tour was the perfect group vacation. The Amalfi Coast is stunning! Traveling by bike, we had a new ‘wow’ moment nearly every time we came around a corner. And then traveling by boat, we saw the coast in a whole new breathtaking way. The islands of Capri, Ischia, and Procida were equally beautiful and fascinating. One of my favorite experiences was watching sunrise from the deck of our boat, the sun illuminating the buildings and churches of the village, a spectacular view I would not have seen from a hotel.
Our guide Alex was fantastic! Her enthusiasm and love for this place made every day special. Her knowledge of the terrain and of the locals enabled us to experience the best of the views, the food (gelato!), and the local culture. She was safety conscious and kept a pace that suited the cycling levels of the group.
Our crew was also very attentive and made us feel right at home. The boat was clean, the food was good, and the service was excellent. Our captain navigated the coast and islands so that we saw the rugged landscape from another perspective.
I highly recommend this trip to anyone wanting to experience this beautiful part of Italy. I believe we saw and experienced so much more traveling by bike and boat than one would by car/bus.

This boat and cycle holiday was amazing.
Our guide Alex took us to the most beautiful places around the Amalfi coast.
Her knowledge and expertise of the history and its nature were very extensive.  She was so much fun as well as being a very professional young lady.  She took everyone's needs into consideration, so everyone could enjoy their holiday. 10/10 for Alex.
The crew of the boat were friendly and the food was delicious and plentiful.
The cycling can be quiet strenuous, but the bikes were of good quality and kept in good order.  If you find uphill taxing, I suggest an ebike, so much easier.
We had a wonderful holiday.
Thank you.
Heather & John Whittaker,
Manchester, England
Fabulous tour.  Hotels and luggage were waiting for us each day. Great bikes. Got lost once or twice but all part of the adventure. Loved Radda, Siena and Volterra.

I cannot say enough amazing things about our trip. we went on this tour from august 14-21, 2016. riccardo was an absolutely phenomenal guide - we enjoyed all of his knowledge about the areas we visited. cycling pace was great and we were never once worried/concerned about where we were going. we really liked the hotels and the food was incredible. the places chosen as stops during the day and at night were perfect. we cannot say one bad thing about our experience. verde natura did a wonderful job planning this trip. we cannot wait to do another cycling trip with verde natura!
Everything was just fine!!! The staff at the hotels were really helpful and kind. Please give them all our best regards. I here enclose some pictures for your website! Thank you very much

Riccardo from verde-natura was the first bike guide we've had and he made things so much easier and more enjoyable than our previous six self-guided tours. he was constantly checking on all the riders and never seemed to mind going back downhill to check on slower riders. everyone on the deriya deniz went to great pains to make sure each of us had what was needed - even supplying food for our picnic lunches. the last evening, we all got a wonderful surprise that was so much fun...but i'll not divulge their secret! the crew really was remarkable. for instance, we had an early morning flight from naples to palermo on the last morning of the trip. in order to get to the airport at the proper time, we had to wake at 4:30 am. every single crew member plus riccardo got up to see us off at 5:00 am making sure once again, we had what we needed or desired. i cannot imagine a better experience in this singularly beautiful location and i highly recommend this trip!
